trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master of Undeath
entries: Orcus can cast {@spell animate dead} (at will) and {@spell create undead} (3/day). He chooses the level at which the spells are cast, and the creatures created by them remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast {@spell create undead} even when it isn't night.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Orcus wields the {@item Wand of Orcus}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Orcus makes three Wand of Orcus, Tail, or Necrotic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Wand of Orcus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d8 + 11}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 5d8 + 7}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Conjure Undead (1/Day)
entries: While holding the {@item Wand of Orcus}, Orcus conjures {@filter Undead creatures|bestiary|type=undead} whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500. These creatures magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Orcus makes one Tail or Necrotic Bolt attack.

legendary.name: Creeping Death (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area have vulnerability to necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Orcus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 23}):

spellcasting.name: Wand Spellcasting
headerEntries: While holding the {@item Wand of Orcus}, Orcus casts one of the following spells (spell save {@dc 18}), some of which require charges; the wand has 7 charges to fuel these spells, and it regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} charges daily at dawn:
